{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Vonger Electronics |model=VoCore |revision=2 Ultimate |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=Currently Shipping |price=39 |est_release_date=December 2016 |fcc_date=05/30/2018 |fcc_id=2AC4RVOCOREV2 |type=mini module, wireless embedded board |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7628AN |cpu1_cspeed=580 |cpu2_brand=GigaDevice |cpu2_model=GD32F150G8 |cpu2_cspeed=72 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q128C |fla2=64 KiB |fla2_brand=GigaDevice |fla2_model=GD32F150G8 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4T1G164QG-BCF7 |ram2=8 KiB |ram2_brand=GigaDevice |ram2_model=GD32F150G8 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, console,, USB Female Micro-B,, (115200 8N1) |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7628AN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=PCB on-board |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=bgn |addl_chips=ARM Cortex-M3 32-bit MCU (72MHz, 64KB ROM, 8KB RAM, 12-bit ADC 10-in, USB 2.0);GigaDevice Semiconductor;GD32F150G8;;1;; QFN-28;,,, Low Power Stereo Audio CODEC;Everest Semiconductor;ES8388;;1;,,, <!-- (Microphone / Headphone Amplifier, 2-ch ADC, 2-ch DAC) --> 1A Step Down Converter;Texas Instruments;TPS62291;;1; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, Audio in/out (3.5mm), GPIO, |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux;3.18.29;OpenWrt 15.05.1; |default_ssid=VoCore2 |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=root |default_pass=vocore |oui=00:0C:43 |oui_eth=00:0C:43 }} :[http://vocore.io/v2u.html Product page]
*[https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/vocore2-4-coin-sized-linux-computer-with-wifi '''Indiegogo''' project for the device]
